title: got a extra lost
body: I just finished playing my promos match that i won and i got a win and a lost i have only played 3 of the matches in the series and im at 2 wins 2 lost. And yes im in my bronze 1 promos. i think my game glitched

replies.body:
A queue dodge will count as a loss in you promotional series and will also make you ineligible for promo helper in that series. For more information on queue dodging, check out [the FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)

Let me know if you have any questions, best of luck in your promos!
